about_the_game:
Welcome to HEXAROMA, the charming world of our island village builder! Dive into a relaxing yet challenging experience where puzzle and strategy meet city building. Set across beautiful hexagonal maps, this game lets you craft quaint villages amidst varied landscapes like snowy tundras, scorching deserts, lush steppes, towering mountains, and dense forests. As my first game, I am incredibly excited to share this cozy adventure with you.



Why should you play this game?
If you're looking for a soothing yet engaging pastime, this is the perfect game for you. It’s designed to be a chill and wholesome escape, allowing you to unwind as you create adorable island communities. Whether you're a seasoned gamer or just looking for a relaxing way to pass the time, the delightful atmosphere and simple mechanics make it easy to pick up and enjoy.



Gameplay is straightforward but rewarding. Place buildings strategically to maximize your score—some structures thrive when close to others, while some need space to flourish. With each milestone you reach on the progress bar, you'll unlock new building packs, keeping the experience fresh and exciting. Watch your village grow as you fill out the map, advancing to larger and more complex maps as you complete each level. The dynamic weather and day-night cycle add an extra layer of immersion, making your village feel alive.



To add a competitive edge, we’ve included an ONLINE LEADERBOARD where you can see how your scores stack up against other players or your friends. Plus, the game supports ACHIEVEMENTS, CROSS-PLATFORM CLOUD SAVE, GAMEPAD SUPPORT, and even runs smoothly on the Steam Deck. It’s not just a game—it’s a little haven of creativity and strategy you can take anywhere.



Get ready to embark on a relaxing journey of village building, where every decision shapes your own little world. I can't wait for you to experience the joy and tranquility this game offers. Happy building!

Please remember, this is a small game and developed by a single person🙂

linux_requirements.minimum:

  • Processor: 1.7 GHz Processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 8 or higher, ATI X1600 or higher, or Intel HD 3000 or higher
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: OpenAL Compatible Sound Card
  • Additional Notes: Proton-8 Recommended
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04+ Desktop only, SteamOS (Proton-8 Recommended)
  • Processor: Dual-core 2Ghz CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 8 or higher, ATI X1600 or higher, or Intel HD 3000 or higher
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: OpenAL Compatible Sound Card
  • Additional Notes: Proton-8 Recommended

short_description: HEXAROMA is a strategy based charming little island village builder. Dive into a relaxing yet challenging experience where you strategize the best hexagon island placements in this cute little city builder game. Place the building pieces strategically, grow your village and your tiny island.
